Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Self-abuse \Self`-abuse"\, n. 1. The abuse of one's own self, powers, or faculties. [1913 Webster]
2. Self-deception; delusion. [Obs.] --Shak. [1913 Webster]
3. Masturbation; onanism; self-pollution. [1913 Webster]
self-abuse n : manual stimulation of the genital organs (of yourself or another) for sexual pleasure [syn: {masturbation}, {onanism}]
